solution_line_template: Cindy gave {envelopes_per_friend} envelopes/friend x {num_friends} friends = <<{envelopes_per_friend}*{num_friends}={envelopes_given}>>{envelopes_given} envelopes to her friends.
Cindy has {initial_envelopes} envelopes - {envelopes_given} envelopes = <<{initial_envelopes}-{envelopes_given}={envelopes_left}>>{envelopes_left} envelopes left.
